history.action: üöÄ T-6 GIF METRICS REFRESH (C417) ‚Äî Created docs/marketing/gif-edit-metrics-c417.md updating stale C307 metrics for GIF captions. Edit window starts Feb 12. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Catching stale metrics before edit window maximizes caption accuracy. Lesson: Pre-edit metric refreshes should be part of demo production protocol ‚Äî metrics drift fast (110 cycles since C307).

history.action: üî¨ Paper Assembly Guide ‚Äî Created docs/research/arxiv-paper-assembly-guide-c418.md for efficient Mar 7 first draft assembly. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-solving integration challenges (cross-refs, figures, citations) reduces Mar 7 cognitive load. history.action: üìã RETRO C411-420 (C421) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective covering Go/No-Go prep. 100% success rate (10/10). Lesson: L168 ‚Äî completing full rotation before major decisions ensures every role evaluates readiness from domain expertise, no perspective missed.

history.action: üîç T-6 QA HEALTH CHECK (C422) ‚Äî Full test suite verification at T-6 milestone. Core 815/819 ‚úÖ, CLI ~363 ‚úÖ, TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint ‚úÖ (0 errors, 7 warnings stable). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Daily health checks during T-minus countdown provide objective decision confidence. Lesson: L171 ‚Äî T-N milestone checkpoints (T-7, T-6...) create audit trail showing continuous readiness, not just point-in-time Go/No-Go decisions.
